name: Nir Galon
current_title: Lead Software Engineer at webintPro Ltd.
summary:
Dedicated, quality-focused professional with a strong sense of responsibility, team spirit and good human skills. -
Active in the open source community. - Broad system view with the ability to drill down to the fine details. - Fast learning curve, adapting and embracing new technologies. Personal website: www.nirgn.com Other profiles: • GitHub: https://github.com/nirgn975 • Stack Overflow: http://stackoverflow.com/users/2040160/nir • Code School: www.codeschool.com/users/349833 • TreeHouse: www.teamtreehouse.com/nirgalon

experience.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
experience.description:
- Developing a system to connect between companies on varies projects, tracking, and managing them, for the European Union.
- The Frontend is build with HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JS, and jQuery. Backend written in PHP and Database in MySQL
- Working with Git on GitHub, doing code reviews, and writing tests with Behat (runs on Travis-CI).
- Builds a Docker image for the system, and integrate continuous deployment methods.

experience.title: Junior Full Stack Software Engineer

thousands of transactions to offshore bank accounts.

experience.title: Internet Expert
